string.name: Caption
string.value: Pick your Focus and start your career! Each focus further specialises into two distinct combat classes. Requires level 10, Once chosen, you will be locked into the class. However, you can reset your skills at the central base in Lyceum later in the game if you change your mind..

string.name: Caption
string.value: Recon Focus is all about quick and agile Light Fighters. Seers take the patient approach, staying undetected to ambush their target. Speed Demons have a simple motto: go fast, shoot faster! Short range dogfights are their preferred method of combat.

string.name: Caption
string.value: The slow and rugged Heavy Fighters are the ship of choice for Combat Focus. Destroy your targets from a distance as a Ranger or protect your allies and force enemies to attack you as a Berserker, dishing out damage by firing multiple weapons at once.

string.name: Caption
string.value: In their huge Capital Ships, Fleet Commanders take control of a range of smaller ships, fighters and can even make their enemies fight for them, while helping their allies with aura generators. Gunners fire two weapons at once, use devastating missiles and have the unique ability to target many enemies, allowing them to take on entire fleets by themselves.

string.name: Caption
string.value: In their combat-fitted Support Freighters, Engineers carry an arsenal of offensive and defensive drones, powerful tractor beams, and unique, specialized equipment, such as modified tractor beams that provide bonuses to allies. Shield Monkeys have unparalleled shield regeneration and healing abilities, allowing them to give up portions of their own shield banks to regenerate the shields of allies.

string.name: Caption
string.value: Speed Demons focus on speed, agility and pelting enemies with a barrage of shots in short-range dogfights.

string.name: Caption
string.value: Seers prefer to stay undetected by employing powerful cloaking devices. They embrace the shadows and ambush their enemies for massive damage.

string.name: Caption
string.value: Ranger attack their targets from great distances, dealing more and more damage with every shot with their unique Ranger Scope. If range is not enough, cloaking devices may assist Rangers in setting up for their attack, or getting away in a pinch.

string.name: Caption
string.value: Berserkers fire up to 3 weapons at once and while they are slow and lumbering, their high resistance bonuses make them excellent at soaking up punishment. In addition, they have access to the unique Shield Redistribution Device that regenerates their shields when they deal damage.

string.name: Caption
string.value: Fleet Commanders use bot-controlled ships and fighters while providing them and their allies with useful combat bonuses through the use of aura generators. In addition, they can capture enemy ships that would not be capturable by other classes.

string.name: Caption
string.value: Gunners make great use of massive weaponry and powerful missiles. In addition, they gain access to the Deathblossom, a weapon overloader that lets them target many enemies at once.

string.name: Caption
string.value: Shield Monkeys pilot ships with large bonuses to shield bank and regeneration. They have enhanced abilities to heal allies with shield transference weaponry, making them a vital part of any squad. On their own, Shield Monkeys can let bot-controlled ships take the role of allies.

string.name: Caption
string.value: Engineers are jacks of all trades, whether it is damaging enemies with offensive drones, keeping allies in the fight with defensive drones or controlling the battlefield with powerful tractor beams. Engineers have access to a variety of specialized equipment, such as tractor beams that can provide energy to allies and shield transference weapons that chain to additional allies.
